siteOrigin.title: Project Technical Highlights
siteOrigin.subtitle: Modern Full-Stack Tech · Engineering Practices · Performance Optimization
siteOrigin.quote:
This project showcases complete modern full-stack development capabilities.

From frontend React 19, Next.js 15, TypeScript, to backend Go microservices, GORM, JWT authentication, to DevOps Docker containerization, Nginx deployment, every aspect demonstrates deep technical understanding and engineering practices.

The project not only implements features but focuses on code quality, performance optimization, security protection - a complete solution ready for production.
